name: @dataforsyningen/icons
description: A collection of icons og logo images that are part of the SDFI design system.

scripts.build: node utils/build.mjs && cp node_modules/@dataforsyningen/css/assets/designsystem.css docs/css/designsystem.css && cp icons/ds-icon-sprites.svg docs/img/
scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified yet" && exit 0
